algorithm_technique: Preorder traversal with recursive string building
problem_summary_simple: Convert a binary tree to a string with specific formatting rules for nodes and children.
problem_summary_technical: Preorder traversal to build string, handling null children with specific parenthesis rules for unique reconstruction.
key_insights: The core idea is a preorder traversal.
Special handling is needed for null left children when a right child exists to maintain unique reconstruction.
Recursion naturally handles the nested structure of the tree.
